  • Method Details

    • moveMN

      public boolean moveMN(int steps)
      Description copied from class: IslandHandler
      Move Mother Nature and put her on island group distant steps by current position of Mother Nature. Mother Nature follows the order of the island group, based on links between them. When reach the correct island group evaluate the influence, if a team wins its towers will be built. Check if there are island groups that can be merged, in this case merge them. Update Mother Nature position and update parameters.
      Overrides:
      moveMN in class IslandHandler
      Parameters:
      steps - > 0

    • checkCorrectSteps

      protected boolean checkCorrectSteps(int steps)
      Overrides:
      checkCorrectSteps in class IslandHandler
      Parameters:
      steps - > 0
      Returns:
      false if player choose an invalid number of steps. Zero or a number greater than played Assistant card's steps.
